description:
This workshop was recorded live. Some live elements have been cut out for your enjoyment. Be sure to make use of the timestamps below. Enjoy!

0:00 Introduction 
1:35 Designing your Data Model 
17:28 Hands-on: Setting up your Database and Schema 
33:21 Connecting to AstraDB 
37:25 Hands-on: Connecting to AstraDB 
45:18 Create and Update Records 
49:11 Hands-on: Running CRUD operations 
57:43 Working with Batch Statements and UDTs 
1:02:58 Hands-on: Inserts with UDTs and Batches 
1:20:26 Hands-on: Simple Selects, Parsing and Paging 
1:32:37 Wrap-up and Resources


GitHub - https://github.com/DataStax-Academy/workshop-crud-with-python-and-node
